content: step-by-step tutorial for an easy junimo plushie using thin yarn and a 2mm hook my junimo measures 2 5x3 cm with different yarns and hooks you can have different results ___________ contains - **desktop version** 2 pdfs with pictures in english and italian - ️**printable version** 1 pdf without pictures to print 1 pdf pictures only as reference for the printed one i d love to see your plushies share a photo on instagram tagging me @dragonsyarn ___________ pattern design © 2025 susanna berra dragon s yarn all rights reserved the pattern is for personal use only do not sell or reproduce the pattern or parts of it you can sell items made from this pattern as long as they are handmade by yourself in limited number and you give me credit as the designer susanna berra dragon s yarn - @dragonsyarn
